attributes.action: Give a council tax rebate for Central Bedfordshire residents
attributes.additional_details:
As council tax payers we pay for household waste services.
In all other circumstances it would be usual for a refund for services not supplied.
attributes.background: Central Bedfordshire Council are suspending 50% of domestic refuse collections, affected residents should receive a rebate on their council tax for services that are not being provided.

rejection.details: Rebates are a matter for local government and this petition anyway deals with action at a local level - and our Standards do not allow petitions which are about action at a local level, especially on matters outwith the central government's remit
